multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop

Class BaseDesktopPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLayeredPane
            • javax.swing.JDesktopPane
              • multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop.BaseDesktopPane
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BaseDesktopPane
extends javax.swing.JDesktopPane
    This class provides a custom desktop pane. The drag mode is set to outline by default, the desktop manager is set to BaseDesktopManager, and the look and feel DesktopIconUI is replaced by the blank icon generator, EmptyDesktopIconUI.
    Version:
    1.0 9-Aug-2001
    Author:
    Tom Tessier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
